timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            set iscalculated = 'Y'
          
          
            
            set iscalculated = 'Y',
          
          
            
            	Updated=`2020-03-10 17:01:56.767453+01`,
          
          
            
            	UpdatedBy=99
          
      
    
    
  


use a hardcoded date string that will be the same in the SQL(-migration script) and the DB
use AD_User_ID 99 which is generally used for "manual" migrations
timeline.author: metas-ts

timeline.message: #6329 set standard columns to iscalculated = 'Y' and updated time and by details;
